titleStmt.title: SII 5.242: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 242. (A.R. No. 566 of 1893). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . vīraba llāḷatevar pṛthivirājyam paṇṇiaruḷā saṁvat saramA portion of the inscription is missing at the right end.
pakṣattu saptamiyum nāyaṟṟukkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa kāttikai nāḷ pāṇṭimaṇṭalattu cintāmaṇivaḷanāṭṭu ⌉e
tiruvikra maṉ kaṇṇappaṉāṉa teṉṉavataraiyaṉeṉ koṅkamaṇṭalattu perur nāṭṭu perur Uṭaiyār ti
ṭaiyanāyanārkku Ucciccantiyile Oru canti teṉṉavataraiyaṉ canti ka yeṉṟu Amutu ceytaruḷa A
kkum kaṟi Amutu mutalāya pala veñcaṉamum Uṭpaṭa nāḷoṉṟukku nellu tūṇippatakku Āka Āṇṭu Oṉṟu
tiṉ kalattukkum teṉṉavataraiyaṉ tiruttoppukkut tirunantavaṉappuṟattukku Āṇṭoṉṟukku ne
lattukkum Ittoppil maṇṭapattile tiruttaippūcattukkum tiruppaṅkūṉit tirunāḷ ti
ḷila Eṟi Aruḷi Amutu ceytaruḷa Amutupaṭi Aricikkum pala veñcaṉattukkum nellu patiṉkalattukkum
m vaḻakkattukku Eṇṇaikkum tiruvitip pantattukku Eṇṇaikkum nellu Eḻukalaṉe kuṟuṇi nāṉāḻiyum Āka
pattaṟukalaṉe Iru tūṇip pata
kku nāṉāḻikkum viṭṭa nilamāvatu Iṉṉāṭṭuk kulacekaranallūr Ūravar pakkal nāṉ vilai koṇṭu Uṭaiyeṉāy Aṉupavi
viranāraāyaṉaṉ maṉṉaṟyil vitai Irupatteḻukalaṉe Irutūṇikku perunāṉku Ellaiyāvatu nāṟpāṟkellai
kavarukku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai Ivvūṟ paṟṟukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai Attikkavarukkiḻakkum
Ilakṣu minārāyaṇapperumāḷ tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattukkut teṟkum Āka Icainta perunāṉkellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa nilattil pe
vitai pataṉaṟukalattiṉāl nilam paṉṉiraṇṭu mā Iṉṉilam paṉṉiraṇṭu māvum teṉṉavataraiyaṉ cantikkum teṉṉa
m tiruttaippūcattukkum tiruppaṅkuṉi tirunāḷ tīttattukkum Amutupṭippuṟamum tirunantavaṉappuṟamumāka viṭṭeṉ ceḻuvaṉūr U
ṉ Innilattukku māttāl Irupattirukalanellāka vanta nellukkuk kulacekaranallūr Ūrum nakarattārum kuṭi niṅkāte
piṟavaraneṟikkāṇiyile Aḷappārkaḷākavum Ippaṭikku Amutu ṟukku Eḻumāhecurarku per Oṉ
m Amutu ceyta kaṟiyamutum tirumuṉ Oṭukkukai Iṭuvatākavum Ippaṭikku cantirātittavarai cella cempilum cilaiyilum veṭṭikkoḷ
ceḻuvaṉūr Uṭaiyāṉ tiruvikkirama kaṇṇappaṉāṉa teṉṉavataraiyaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Ivai teṉṉavataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu Itupa
Digital edition of SII 5.241 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
